sourceDesc.p: Generated from the Microsoft Word Document Books to Read.doc.

listChange.change: Converted trait to catRef. My customization has allowed //bibl/catRef since .

Converted some authors into persName inside respStmt, highlighting artists in particular. Added many new entries for graphic novels, because I have a bad habit of forgetting where I left off in a series (a problem I've already solved by using this document).
Added xml:lang for the entire document. Added renditional information.
Added "owned" tags to books I own but have not yet read. Tags include a pointer to the book's catalog entry.
Added personography references to the authors already represented in .
Added series to most books that needed them.

list.item: changed catRef to trait for validation purposes; and
started using date with type of "added" to keep track of how long items stay on this list.

listChange.change: Created the first version of this list in Microsoft Word.
